column1: How can adding Music be useful for my group?
column2: Adding Music on your group will enable you create and share multiple Playlists on your group. An attractive music player provides great experience to visitors of your group. This is a great tool to showcase your talent and work on your group.

column1: How can I add Music to my group?
column2:
You can add Music to your group in one of the following ways:
1. To add a music playlist, please follow the steps below:
a. Go to the group Profile.
b. Click “Music” tab on the group Profile. You might have to click on the “More” tab to expand the menu bar to see “Music”.
c. Click on “Upload Music” link from the top left corner of the “Music” tab to add music.
d. Fill up the form to add music. To make your group music playlist attractive, upload a suitable image for your “Playlist Artwork”.
e. Click on “Add Music” to upload music for your group.
f. Click on “Save Music to Playlist”, to save Playlist for your group.
 
2. From the “Apps” section of your group Dashboard, click on the “Upload Music” button and follow the steps from ‘d’ to ‘f’ as in case 1 above.

column1: How many songs can I upload in a Playlist on my group?
column2: There is no limit to the number of songs that you can upload in a Playlist on your group. You can upload any number of songs on your group.

column1: How many Playlists can I create?
column2: There is no limit on the number of Playlists that you can create for your group. You can create any number of Playlists for your group.
Yes, you can rename your Playlists by using the “Edit Playlist” option for them.

column1: What is the purpose of “Play on group Profile”?
column2: Amongst the music playlists for your group, you might want to highlight one of them. This could be because that playlist might be a recent release, your most admired tracks, etc. The music playlist of your group for which you select the “Play on group Profile” option, will be prominently displayed on your group Profile in a block. This also makes your group more attractive.

column1: I want to search for a specific group Music playlist. How can I do that?
column2: You can search for a group Music playlist by using the detailed search box available in the “Music” section under group navigation.

column1: Who all can create Music on my group?
column2: You can choose who all can create Music for your group while creating your group, by choosing the appropriate option for the “Music Creation Privacy” field. You can edit this privacy any time by clicking on the “Edit group Details” link for your group.

column1: I have a group on this site. However, the Music feature is not available for my group. What could be the reason?
column2:
The reason why Music feature is not available for your group could be that, you might have chosen a Package for your group for which the Music App is not available. In this case, you can see if choosing a different Package with the Music App suits you. You can change the Package for your group from the “Packages” section of your group Dashboard.
Availability of Packages for groups, and their features are conditional depending on the settings chosen by our site administrator.
